CodeEditorModel.Text:
'Add global subroutines Sub DisableAxis NJ_CPU_Enable_Ax0=False NJ_CPU_Enable_Ax1=False NJ_CPU_Enable_Ax2=False End Sub
Sub EnableAxis NJ_CPU_Enable_Ax0=True NJ_CPU_Enable_Ax1=True NJ_CPU_Enable_Ax2=True End Sub
Sub EnableAxis_for_Combine NJ_CPU_Enable_Ax0=False NJ_CPU_Enable_Ax1=True NJ_CPU_Enable_Ax2=True End Sub
